channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 亚洲感受到印度洋葱出口禁令的刺痛
item.description: India's ban on the export of onions has driven up prices of the vegetable for Asian buyers, who are scrambling for cheaper alternatives, particularly as New Delhi is unlikely to lift the curbs before general elections next year.翻译:印度对洋葱出口的禁令推高了亚洲买家的蔬菜价格，他们正在争相寻找更便宜的替代品，特别是因为新德里不太可能在明年大选前解除限制。
item.author: Rajendra Jadhav, Ruma Paul, Gopal Sharma

item.title: 极涡减弱可能是中国大寒的罪魁祸首
item.description: The cause of a wave of bitingly cold air that swept into China and rewrote seasonal records for low temperatures may lie further north - a potential weakening in the wall of fast-moving air currents that normally hold back blasts from the Arctic.翻译:一波刺骨的冷空气席卷中国并改写季节性低温记录的原因可能在更北的地方——通常会阻挡来自北极的疾风的快速移动的气流墙可能会减弱。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 美国和中国仍是 2024 年最值得关注的信用评级
item.description: The U.S. and China on downgrade warnings, Turkey hoping for its first upgrade in a decade and Israel facing its first cut - plus more than 50 elections to navigate - means 2024 could bring pivotal moves in some sovereign credit ratings.翻译:美国和中国发出评级下调警告，土耳其希望十年来首次升级，以色列面临首次下调，再加上 50 多场选举需要进行，这意味着 2024 年一些主权信用评级可能会出现关键性变动。
item.author: Marc Jones

item.title: 菲律宾就南海主张斥责中国
item.description: The Philippine defence minister rebuked China on Wednesday for accusing his country of provoking tension and stirring trouble in the South China Sea, saying only Beijing believed what it was saying.翻译:菲律宾国防部长周三斥责中国指责菲律宾在南海挑起紧张局势并煽动麻烦，称只有北京相信其所说的话。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾将根据威胁程度“处理”大量中国气球
item.description: Taiwan will "handle" Chinese balloons flying nearby based on threat assessments, though officials believe the current wave is for weather purposes, driven by the prevailing winds at this time of year, the defence ministry in Taipei said on Wednesday.翻译:台北国防部周三表示，台湾将根据威胁评估“处理”在附近飞行的中国热气球，不过官员们认为当前的热气球是出于天气目的，由每年这个时候的盛行风驱动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尼加拉瓜升级与中国关系，在西方制裁中寻求财政支持
item.description: China and Nicaragua upgraded their bilateral ties on Wednesday, setting the stage for the Asian giant to provide more economic support to the sanctioned Central American state and furthering Beijing's strategic ambitions in the United States' backyard.翻译:中国和尼加拉瓜周三升级了双边关系，为这个亚洲巨人向这个受制裁的中美洲国家提供更多经济支持奠定了基础，并进一步推进了北京在美国后院的战略野心。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 中国地震灾民在零度以下的天气下被安全救出
item.description: Braving below-freezing conditions, rescuers pulled to safety victims of an earthquake, while survivors faced months of uncertainty ahead without permanent shelter.翻译:救援人员冒着低于冰点的条件，将地震灾民救至安全地带，而幸存者则面临着未来数月的不确定性，没有永久的住所。
item.author: Alessandro Diviggiano, Xiaoyu Yin, Liz Lee

item.title: 李氏家族将通过交易走出价值陷阱
item.description: Li Ka-shing, Asia’s original tycoon, converted to shareholder religion nearly a decade ago when he carved up his Hong Kong-based empire. Though investors supported the deal, they have rapidly lost faith in the company as Sino-American tensions rise. Solving the value conundrum will be a top priority for his son Victor Li in 2024.翻译:亚洲最初的大亨李嘉诚在近十年前瓜分其香港帝国时皈依了股东信仰。尽管投资者支持这笔交易，但随着中美紧张局势加剧，他们很快对该公司失去了信心。解决价值难题将是他的儿子李泽钜2024年的首要任务。
item.author: Una Galani

item.title: 中国如预期维持贷款基准利率不变
item.description: Market watchers expect Beijing to deliver further monetary easing into the new year.翻译:市场观察人士预计，北京将在新的一年进一步实施货币宽松政策。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国零售商战略转变可能加剧通货紧缩
item.description: A shift in Chinese retailers' strategy toward lower-priced goods and services to win cost-conscious consumers risks embedding the country's recent deflationary trends more permanently into the world's second-largest economy.翻译:中国零售商转向低价商品和服务以赢得注重成本的消费者的战略转变，有可能使中国近期的通货紧缩趋势更永久地融入到这个世界第二大经济体中。
item.author: Sophie Yu, Brenda Goh

item.title: 美国将13家中国企业列入未经核实名单
item.description: The United States has added 13 companies in China to a list of entities receiving U.S. exports that officials have been unable to inspect, according to a government notice posted on Tuesday.翻译:根据周二发布的政府通知，美国已将 13 家中国公司列入接收美国出口产品的实体名单，但官员无法对其进行检查。
item.author: Karen Freifeld

item.title: 全球10大钢铁企业
item.description: Japan's Nippon Steel clinched a deal on Monday to buy U.S. Steel for $14.9 billion in cash.翻译:日本新日铁周一达成协议，将以 149 亿美元现金收购美国钢铁公司。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国暂停制裁后，中化集团购买稀有的委内瑞拉石油船货--消息人士
item.description: China's Sinochem Corp has bought a million barrels of Venezuelan crude oil for arrival in December, a rare purchase as the state oil and chemicals group capitalises on Washington's suspension of sanctions on the South American producer.翻译:中国中化集团公司已购买了100万桶委内瑞拉原油，将于12月抵达，这在这家国有石油和化工集团利用华盛顿暂停对这家南美生产商实施制裁的机会之际进行了罕见的购买。
item.author: Chen Aizhu, Florence Tan

item.title: 香港民主人士黎智英的安全审判面临外交压力
item.description: International pressure was building over a landmark national security trial in Hong Kong for leading China critic Jimmy Lai, with British authorities calling for consular access to the jailed democrat as his trial entered its second day on Tuesday.翻译:国际压力正在因香港对中国批评家黎智英进行的具有里程碑意义的国家安全审判而增加，随着周二审判进入第二天，英国当局要求领事探视这位被监禁的民主党人。
item.author: James Pomfret, Jessie Pang

item.title: 抛开紧张局势，台湾总统在致命地震后向中国提供援助
item.description: Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen expressed condolences to China on Tuesday and offered her government's help after an earthquake killed more than 100 people on the northern edge of the Qinghai-Tibetan plateau.翻译:青藏高原北部边缘发生地震，造成100多人死亡，台湾总统蔡英文周二向中国表示哀悼，并向中国政府提供帮助。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾总统称与中国的外交努力“朝着糟糕的方向发展”
item.description: Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said a "paradigm shift" was needed in how his country approaches the South China Sea issue, as diplomatic efforts with Beijing were headed "in a poor direction".翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯表示，菲律宾处理南海问题的方式需要“范式转​​变”，因为与北京的外交努力“朝着糟糕的方向发展”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾报告另一个疑似中国气象气球穿越台湾海峡
item.description: A suspected Chinese weather balloon flew across the sensitive Taiwan Strait on Monday but stayed well north of Taiwan, the island's defence ministry said on Tuesday, the third time this month Taipei has reported them nearby.翻译:台湾国防部周二表示，一个疑似中国气象气球周一飞越敏感的台湾海峡，但仍停留在台湾以北的地方，这是本月台北第三次报告称气球在附近。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2024年中国经济能否重回正轨？
item.description: China's disappointing post-COVID recovery has raised significant doubts about the foundations of its decades of stunning growth and presented Beijing with a tough choice for 2024 and beyond: take on more debt or grow less.翻译:中国在新冠疫情后令人失望的复苏让人对其数十年惊人增长的基础产生了重大怀疑，并给北京带来了2024年及以后的艰难选择：承担更多债务还是减少增长。
item.author: Marius Zaharia

item.title: 曼钦寻求撤销财政部允许部分中国矿物用于电动汽车的豁免
item.description: The chair of the Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee wants Congress to vote on reversing the Treasury Department's electric vehicle tax credit guidance, saying it will increase U.S. reliance on China.翻译:参议院能源和自然资源委员会主席希望国会投票推翻财政部的电动汽车税收抵免指导，称这将增加美国对中国的依赖。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 立法者希望拜登拒绝向中国无人机制造商大疆创新颁发出口许可证
item.description: A group of 15 Republican lawmakers Monday asked the Pentagon to block export licenses for U.S. components for Chinese-drone manufacturer DJI, citing national security concerns.翻译:周一，由 15 名共和党议员组成的小组以国家安全为由，要求五角大楼阻止向中国无人机制造商大疆创新发放美国零部件的出口许可证。
item.author: David Shepardson
